scripts.lambda:build: mkdir -p tmp; cp -r {*.js,package.json,data} tmp; cd tmp; rm -f ../bulkdownload.zip; zip -r --symlinks ../bulkdownload.zip *; cd ../; rm -rf tmp
scripts.lambda:update: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name bulkdownload --s3-bucket generic-lambda-function --s3-key bulkdownload.zip
scripts.publish:lambda: npm run lambda:build && npm run lambda:update && npm run test
